info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Perry County through 815 PM CDT... At 730 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinckneyville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tamaroa around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Du Quoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
